get.description: Backup management servers registered to Recovery Services Vault. Returns a pageable list of servers.

AzureBackupServerEngine.description: Backup engine type when Azure Backup Server is used to manage the backups.

recoveryPointExpiryTimeInUTC.description: Backup copy will expire after the time specified (UTC).

parentContainerFriendlyName.description: Friendly name of container to which this protectable item belongs.

azureFileShareType.description: File Share type XSync or XSMB.

AzureFileShareProvisionILRRequest.description: Update snapshot Uri with the correct friendly Name of the source Azure file share.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMContainer.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing a classic virtual machine.

protectedItemCount.description: Number of items backed up in this container.

serverName.description: Host/Cluster Name for instance or AG

isAutoProtectable.description: Indicates if workload item is auto-protectable

subinquireditemcount.description: For instance or AG, indicates number of DB's present

subWorkloadItemCount.description: For instance or AG, indicates number of DB's to be protected

parentUniqueName.description:
Parent Unique Name is added to provide the service formatted URI Name of the Parent
Only Applicable for data bases where the parent would be either Instance or a SQL AG.

serverName.description: Host/Cluster Name for instance or AG

isAutoProtectable.description: Indicates if protectable item is auto-protectable

isAutoProtected.description: Indicates if protectable item is auto-protected

subinquireditemcount.description: For instance or AG, indicates number of DB's present

subprotectableitemcount.description: For instance or AG, indicates number of DB's to be protected

dataDirectoryPaths.description: Data Directory Paths for default directories

backupType.description: Type of backup, viz. Full, Differential, Log or CopyOnlyFull

recoveryPointExpiryTimeInUTC.description: Backup copy will expire after the time specified (UTC).

AzureWorkloadContainer.description: Container for the workloads running inside Azure Compute or Classic Compute.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this Azure Workload Container

lastUpdatedTime.description: Time stamp when this container was updated.

extendedInfo.description: Additional details of a workload container.

workloadType.description: Workload type for which registration was sent.

hostServerName.description: Host Os Name in case of Stand Alone and Cluster Name in case of distributed container.

nodesList.description: List of the nodes in case of distributed container.

BackupEngineBase.description: The base backup engine class. All workload specific backup engines derive from this class.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup engine.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backup engine.

registrationStatus.description: Registration status of the backup engine with the Recovery Services Vault.

backupEngineState.description: Status of the backup engine with the Recovery Services Vault. = {Active/Deleting/DeleteFailed}

healthStatus.description: Backup status of the backup engine.

canReRegister.description: Flag indicating if the backup engine be registered, once already registered.

isAzureBackupAgentUpgradeAvailable.description: To check if backup agent upgrade available

isDpmUpgradeAvailable.description: To check if backup engine upgrade available

BackupEngineBaseResource.description: The base backup engine class. All workload specific backup engines derive from this class.

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of protected items in the backup engine.

protectedServersCount.description: Number of protected servers in the backup engine.

diskCount.description: Number of disks in the backup engine.

usedDiskSpace.description: Disk space used in the backup engine.

availableDiskSpace.description: Disk space currently available in the backup engine.

refreshedAt.description: Last refresh time in the backup engine.

azureProtectedInstances.description: Protected instances in the backup engine.

BackupRequest.description: Base class for backup request. Workload-specific backup requests are derived from this class.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

BackupRequestResource.description: Base class for backup request. Workload-specific backup requests are derived from this class.

storageTypeState.description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.

ClientScriptForConnect.description: Client script details for file / folder restore.

scriptContent.description: File content of the client script for file / folder restore.

scriptExtension.description: File extension of the client script for file / folder restore - .ps1 , .sh , etc.

osType.description: OS type - Windows, Linux etc. for which this file / folder restore client script works.

url.description: URL of Executable from where to source the content. If this is not null then ScriptContent should not be used

scriptNameSuffix.description:
Mandatory suffix that should be added to the name of script that is given for download to user.
If its null or empty then , ignore it.

servicePrincipalClientId.description: Protection container identity - AAD Service Principal

DistributedNodesInfo.description: This is used to represent the various nodes of the distributed container.

nodeName.description: Name of the node under a distributed container.

status.description:
Status of this Node.
Failed | Succeeded

errorDetail.description: Error Details if the Status is non-success.

dpmServers.description: List of BackupEngines protecting the container

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time of the DPMContainer.

message.description: Error Message related to the Code.

extendedInformation.description: Extended information (not returned in List container API calls)

serviceEndpoints.description: Azure Backup Service Endpoints for the container

virtualMachineVersion.description: Specifies whether the container represents a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of Recovery Services Vault.

recoveryPointId.description: ID of the IaaS VM backup copy from where the files/folders have to be restored.

renewExistingRegistration.description: Whether to renew existing registration with the iSCSI server.

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

status.description:
Inquiry Status for this container such as
InProgress | Failed | Succeeded

Inquiry Details which will have workload specific details.
For e.g. - For SQL and oracle this will contain different details.

errorDetail.description: Error Detail in case the status is non-success.

protectedItemCount.description: Number of items backed up in this container.

mabContainerHealthDetails.description: Health details on this mab container.

backupItemType.description: Type of backup items associated with this container.

backupItems.description: List of backup items associated with this container.

policyName.description: Backup policy associated with this container.

lastBackupStatus.description: Latest backup status of this container.

error.description: Error information related to this operation.

properties.description: Additional information associated with this operation.

code.description: Error code of the operation failure.

message.description: Error message displayed if the operation failure.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

protectableContainerType.description:
Type of the container. The value of this property for
1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines
2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines

healthStatus.description: Status of health of the container.

containerId.description: Fabric Id of the container such as ARM Id.

ProtectionContainer.description: Base class for container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the container.

registrationStatus.description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.

healthStatus.description: Status of health of the container.

containerType.description:
Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2.
Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is
Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer. 5. Storage containers is StorageContainer. 6. Azure workload
Backup is VMAppContainer

ProtectionContainerResource.description: Base class for container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

id.description: Resource Id represents the complete path to the resource.

name.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

type.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources. Call ListNext() fetches next page of resources.

type.description: Type of the Workload such as SQL, Oracle etc.

itemCount.description: Contains the protectable item Count inside this Container.
